title: Launcher Issues
body:
I am currently unable to start league with the new client (also the old one?) because of corruption (had to shut down pc during update). Install program doesn't give me repair option, only uninstall. Also if I download the install from the net it gives me the same thing as I had. So to sum it up I am unable to start league and unable to fix it by means known to me.
EDIT: Everything is fine and working now.

replies.body:
Hey Azure Dancer,

Try forcing repatch:

* Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\
* Delete "lol_launcher" and "lol_patcher" folders
* Launch League of Legends, it should start downloading patch
So this fixed my old client but I still can't start new one. Any ideas?
What specific behavior are you seeing when you try to launch the Beta Client?

* Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\ and delete LeagueClient.exe
* Then launch Legacy Client
* Press "?" icon on top right corner then select "Repair"
Will try that tomorrow and will report back. Thanks
